background_description: The scene depicts a vibrant underwater coral reef ecosystem. It features various coral types including large, flat plate corals in shades of yellow-green and tan-brown, intricate branching corals, and more rounded formations. The water is clear, appearing blue-green towards the surface and darker in shaded areas. The environment has a rich mix of colors and complex textures, characteristic of a healthy reef.
